column3: pron. ) was the great ship of Tuor in which he and Idril sailed into the West. It was a tradition under the Eldar and Edain that they arrived in Valinor
column4: bypassing the Ban of the Valar.

column1: Tolkien provides a direct translation for Eärrámë within The Silmarillion: "Sea-Wing". This comes from eär "sea" and rámë "wing".
